languages.text: "Моложе. Таким, каким я впервые узрела его. Моложе была и я. Словно мы сошлись в тренировочном поединке, как прежде".

traits.locale_text: "Он был... сильно моложе. Таким, каким я впервые узрела его. Сильно моложе казалась и я. Словно мы сошлись в одном из бесчисленных тренировочный поединков, как сходились прежде. До того, как я стала высшим ткачом".

languages.text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
languages.original_text: "Моложе. Таким, каким я впервые узрела его. Моложе была и я. Словно мы сошлись в тренировочном поединке, как прежде".

traits.locale_text: "Younger. The way he looked when I first saw him. I was younger too. As though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
"Younger. The way he looked when I first saw him. I was younger too. As though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
"Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
"Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
"Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
"Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."

languages.text: « Il était plus jeune. À l'image de ses traits le jour où je l'ai rencontré. Et moi aussi, j'étais plus jeune. Comme au temps de l'un de nos nombreux duels d'entraînements... »
languages.original_text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."

traits.locale_text: « Il était plus jeune. À l'image de ses traits le jour où je l'ai rencontré. Et moi aussi, j'étais plus jeune. Comme au temps de l'un de nos nombreux duels d'entraînements... »

languages.text: «Más joven, como la primera vez que lo vi. Yo también lo era. Era como si nos enfrentáramos en un combate de entrenamiento como los de antaño».
languages.original_text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."

traits.locale_text: «Más joven, como la primera vez que lo vi. Yo también lo era. Era como si nos enfrentáramos en un combate de entrenamiento como los de antaño».

languages.text: 「若かった頃。初めて会ったときのようでした。我もまた若かった。まるで昔のように訓練のときに向かい合っているかのようでした」
languages.original_text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."

traits.locale_text: 「若かった頃。初めて会ったときのようでした。我もまた若かった。まるで昔のように訓練のときに向かい合っているかのようでした」

languages.text: “更年轻，就像我第一次见到他的样子一样。我自己也变得更加年轻，就好像我们又像过去那样，进行了一场训练对抗。”
languages.original_text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."

traits.locale_text: “更年轻，就像我第一次见到他的样子一样。我自己也变得更加年轻，就好像我们又像过去那样，进行了一场训练对抗。”

languages.text: "Jünger. Wie er war, als ich ihn zum ersten Mal gesehen habe. Ich war auch jünger. Es war, als würden wir uns in einem Übungskampf gegenüberstehen, wie früher."
languages.original_text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."

traits.locale_text: "Jünger. Wie er war, als ich ihn zum ersten Mal gesehen habe. Ich war auch jünger. Es war, als würden wir uns in einem Übungskampf gegenüberstehen, wie früher."

languages.text: "Daha gençti. Onu ilk gördüğüm hâli gibiydi. Ben de daha gençtim. Tıpkı imtihan karşılaşmalarında mücadele ettiğimiz zamanları andırıyordu."
languages.original_text: "Younger. The way he was when I first saw him. I was younger, too. It was as though we were facing each other in a training match like we used to."
